title: Ravens claim WR Johnson; could yield extra pick
description: Receiver Diontae Johnson was claimed by the Ravens after he was waived by the Texans. He can't join Baltimore until after the Super Bowl and will be a free agent.

title: Sources: Suns get Richards in trade with Hornets
description: The Suns added some much-needed frontcourt help, acquiring center Nick Richards from the Hornets for guard Josh Okogie in a trade that includes multiple draft picks, sources told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: The Warriors are done as contenders. Is it time for Steph to go?
description: Golden State is mediocre and Curry's career timeline is reaching a similar spot as Tom Brady's last year in New England. A trade would help both player and team.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Diontae Johnson back with Baltimore after Ravens claim wide receiver off waivers from Texans
description: An unrestricted free agent, Johnson can earn the Ravens an extra 2026 draft pick if he signs with another team in the offseason.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: 'The door is ajar for Arsenal - this must be their catalyst'
description: Arsenal's vital win over Tottenham must be the catalyst for both their Premier League title challenge and a striker search, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: 'Not acceptable' - Postecoglou on 'thin ice' at Spurs
description: With six defeats in their past 10 games, a loss to their biggest rivals and closer to the relegation zone than the top four, things are going from bad to worse for Tottenham.

title: Will Arsenal capitalise on Liverpool slip in NLD?
Man City crumble again as Slot's bold changes pay off
